name: Toon Tanks (itch)
description:
Toon Tanks is a free, turn-based Android game where you battle your friends with tanks.

 Features:

  • player vs. AI
  • player vs. player (offline)
  • several tanks and ammunition
  • music and sounds

 The game was made by David Eisenhour and Quan Phan for our Mobile Application Design class. We used free assets that were under the Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 License.
